title: Glow Tulip
summaries: The Glow Tulip is a pet-summoning item that summons a Caveling Gardener pet which follows the player around. It can be found rarely near left and right edges of the world below Surface as a plant. Depending on world size, a set amount of Glow Tulips will spawn during world generation, 2 in small worlds, 4 in medium worlds, and 6 in large worlds, usually with half of them generating at the left side of the world, and the other half generating at the right.
